steps.step: Step back with your left foot into a right neutral bow as you pin your opponent's left hand to your chest with your left hand. Simultaneously execute a right upward block to your opponent's left elbow.
Execute a right hammering inward block to your opponent's left arm as you release your pin
Execute a right outward hand sword strike to your opponent's neck

notes.note: When the opponent is really grabbing as if to punch, stepping back often isn't an option. To get the arm bar, the uppercut/upward block needs to act similarly to the uppercut in obscure claws.
